mapper.select: select acorp1, acorp2, acorp3, acorp, asano1, asano2, asano3, asano1 + '-' + asano2 + '-' + asano3 as asanotxt, aname, aupte, ajong, apost1, acorp1 + CAST(acorp2 as varchar) as acode, ajuso1, ajuso2, abigo, agita, ajumi1, ajumi2, ajumi1 + '-' + ajumi2 as ajumitxt, aascode1,aascode2, aascode1 + '-' + aascode2 as aascodetxt, atelno, atelno2, ahand , aemail,abonsadam1, abonsadam2, abonsadam3, adomain, afax, isnull(ajuso1,'') + ' ' + isnull(ajuso2,'') as ajusotxt, B.pernm as inname01, C.pernm as inname02, D.pernm as inname03, E.cifcodename as cifcodename from cif WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_xusers B WITH(NOLOCK) ON (cif.abonsadam1 = B.perid) LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_xusers C WITH(NOLOCK) ON (cif.abonsadam2 = C.perid) LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_xusers D WITH(NOLOCK) ON (cif.abonsadam3 = D.perid) LEFT OUTER JOIN cifcode E WITH(NOLOCK) ON (cif.acorp1 = E.cifcode) WHERE isnull(acorp,'') Like concat('%',#{acorp},'%') and isnull(delflag,'') <> '1' ORDER BY acorp

select acorp1, acorp2, acorp3, acorp, asano1, asano2, asano3, asano1 + '-' + asano2 + '-' + asano3 as asanotxt, aname, aupte, ajong, apost1, acorp1 + CAST(acorp2 as varchar) as acode, ajuso1, ajuso2, abigo, agita, ajumi1, ajumi2, ajumi1 + '-' + ajumi2 as ajumitxt, aascode1,aascode2, aascode1 + '-' + aascode2 as aascodetxt, atelno, atelno2, ahand , aemail,abonsadam1, abonsadam2, abonsadam3, adomain, afax, isnull(ajuso1,'') + ' ' + isnull(ajuso2,'') as ajusotxt, B.pernm as inname01, C.pernm as inname02, D.pernm as inname03, E.cifcodename as cifcodename from cif WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_xusers B WITH(NOLOCK) ON (cif.abonsadam1 = B.perid) LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_xusers C WITH(NOLOCK) ON (cif.abonsadam2 = C.perid) LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_xusers D WITH(NOLOCK) ON (cif.abonsadam3 = D.perid) LEFT OUTER JOIN cifcode E WITH(NOLOCK) ON (cif.acorp1 = E.cifcode) WHERE isnull(acorp,'') Like concat( '%', #{acorp},'%') and isnull(delflag,'0') = '0' and isnull(acorp1,'') Like concat('%',#{acorp1},'%') and isnull(agita,'') Like concat('%',#{agita},'%') and isnull(agita,'') <> 'Z' and isnull(abonsadam1,'') Like concat('%',#{abonsadam1},'%') ORDER BY acorp

select acorp1, acorp2, acorp3, acorp, asano1, asano2, asano3, asano1 + '-' + asano2 + '-' + asano3 as asanotxt, aname, aupte, ajong, apost1, acorp1 + CAST(acorp2 as varchar) as acode, ajuso1, ajuso2, abigo, agita, ajumi1, ajumi2, ajumi1 + '-' + ajumi2 as ajumitxt, aascode1,aascode2, aascode1 + '-' + aascode2 as aascodetxt, atelno, atelno2, ahand , aemail,abonsadam1, abonsadam2, abonsadam3, adomain, afax, isnull(ajuso1,'') + ' ' + isnull(ajuso2,'') as ajusotxt, B.username as inname01, '' as inname02, '' as inname03, E.cifcodename as cifcodename from cif WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_XUSERS B WITH(NOLOCK) ON (cif.abonsadam1 = B.perid and B.flag ='CC') LEFT OUTER JOIN cifcode E WITH(NOLOCK) ON (cif.acorp1 = E.cifcode) WHERE acorp1 + CAST(acorp2 as varchar) = #{acode} ORDER BY acorp

select acorp1, acorp2, acorp3, acorp, asano1, asano2, asano3, asano1 + '-' + asano2 + '-' + asano3 as asanotxt, aname, aupte, ajong, apost1, acorp1 + CAST(acorp2 as varchar) as acode, ajuso1, ajuso2, abigo, agita, ajumi1, ajumi2, ajumi1 + '-' + ajumi2 as ajumitxt, aascode1,aascode2, aascode1 + '-' + aascode2 as aascodetxt, atelno, atelno2, ahand , aemail,abonsadam1, abonsadam2, abonsadam3, adomain, afax, isnull(ajuso1,'') + ' ' + isnull(ajuso2,'') as ajusotxt from cif WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE acorp1 = '00' ORDER BY acorp
select isnull(max(acorp2),'0') from cif where acorp1 = #{acorp1}
